snippet: The paper hired David Callaway, who has a background in financial news reporting and editing. He arrives at a time of declining circulation for USA Today.
abstract: The paper hired David Callaway, who has a background in financial news reporting and editing. He arrives at a time of declining circulation for USA Today.

headline.main: USA Today Hires New Top Editor, From MarketWatch
headline.print_headline: USA Today Hires a New Editor With a Digital Background
